backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining client management, interventions, technical folder hierarchy with files/subfolders, user profiles, and access control using mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features for file moving functionality: TechnicalFileRow move action, folder selection dialog component, and useMoveFile mutation hook.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, and hooks describing authentication, client management, interventions, offline sync, and technical folder functionality with French translations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, manifest link, French language setting, noscript fallback, and module script loading for React application.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, display mode, theme colors, and orientation for installable web application in French.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for assets, network-first for navigation, with cache versioning and cleanup on activation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for login, clients, dossier, technical folder, and dashboard, plus QueryClient, InternetIdentity provider, profile setup dialog, and error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUnloc: Empty file placeholder for admin unlock dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog forcing new authenticated users to enter their name before continuing, with form validation and save mutation integration.
frontend/src/components/blacklist/Blackl: Displays and manages client blacklist status with comments and media attachments. Allows marking/unmarking clients as blacklisted with supporting documentation.
frontend/src/components/clients/CreateCl: Modal dialog for creating new clients with form fields for name, address, phone, and email. Submits data via useCreateOrUpdateClient hook.
frontend/src/components/clients/EditClie: Modal dialog for editing existing client information. Pre-populates form with current client data and updates via useCreateOrUpdateClient hook.
Reusable badge component with custom variants (success, warning, pending) in addition to standard Badge variants. Applies color-coded styling for different states.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBoun: React error boundary component that catches and displays errors with a reload button. Shows error message in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/guards/Authentic: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to home page. Shows loading spinner during authentication check.
frontend/src/components/interventions/Ad: Modal dialog for adding new interventions with date, comments, and media attachments. Handles file uploads and converts them to ExternalBlob format.
frontend/src/components/interventions/Ed: Dialog component for editing an existing intervention with form fields for date, comments, and media attachments. Uses useUpdateIntervention hook to persist changes and includes MediaPicker/MediaPreview for file handling.
frontend/src/components/interventions/In: Read-only dialog displaying intervention details (date, author, comments, media) with conditional edit button that opens EditInterventionDialog. Fetches author profile and manages dialog state transitions.
Main list view for client interventions with add/edit/delete actions and confirmation dialogs. Renders InterventionCard components and manages multiple dialog states for CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileLay: Mobile-optimized layout wrapper with sticky header, logout/dashboard navigation, connectivity status bar, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution. Manages authentication state and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/media/FilePicker: Simple file picker button component that programmatically creates and triggers a file input element with configurable accept types and multiple file support.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaPicke: Dual-mode media picker with camera capture and gallery selection options. Uses useCamera hook for live camera preview and photo capture in a modal dialog.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaPrevi: Grid-based preview component that displays ExternalBlob media items as images with error handling for failed loads.
frontend/src/components/sync/Connectivit: Status bar showing online/offline state and pending sync operations count with manual sync trigger button. Conditionally renders based on connectivity and pending changes.
frontend/src/components/technical-folder: Dialog for creating new folders with name validation (no slashes, non-empty). Shows informational toast that folder creation requires file upload rather than creating empty directories.

Dialog component for moving files between folders in the technical folder structure. Builds a navigable folder tree from file paths and allows users to select a destination folder with breadcrumb navigation.
Displays a single technical file with preview (PDF, image, video), download functionality, and actions to move or delete the file. Includes confirmation dialogs for destructive operations.
Dialog component for uploading files to the technical folder with file name input, file picker, and upload progress tracking. Converts selected files to ExternalBlob format before upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Handles actor creation with identity, admin token initialization, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlacklist.ts: Provides mutations for marking and unmarking clients as blacklisted with comments and media attachments. Invalidates client queries and shows toast notifications on success or error.
frontend/src/hooks/useClients.ts: Provides queries and mutations for client management including fetching all clients, fetching individual clients, and creating/updating clients. Supports offline operation queueing when network is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides queries and mutations for user profile management including fetching the caller's profile, fetching other user profiles by Principal, and saving the caller's profile with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides login, logout, and status tracking functionality with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useInterventions.ts: Provides React Query hooks for managing client interventions (add, update, delete, get) with offline support via operation queuing and online/offline status checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Custom React hook that tracks browser online/offline status using navigator.onLine and window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Hook that manages offline operation synchronization, tracking pending operation count and automatically syncing when online with an actor available.
frontend/src/hooks/useTechnicalFolder.ts: React Query hooks for managing technical files including listing, uploading, deleting, and moving files with folder path support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors and safe-area utilities for mobile device insets.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: IndexedDB wrapper providing operations for managing offline operation outbox and cache stores with typed interfaces.
frontend/src/offline/outbox.ts: IndexedDB-based queue for storing offline operations with functions to enqueue, retrieve, and remove operations by ID.
frontend/src/offline/syncEngine.ts: Processes queued offline operations by replaying them through the backend actor, handling different operation types and removing completed or unauthorized operations.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDossierPage.tsx: Client detail page with tabs for interventions, contact information, and blacklist management, including edit functionality for non-blacklisted clients.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Displays a searchable list of clients with a link to the technical folder, allows creating new clients via dialog, and navigates to individual client detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows a calendar for date selection and displays interventions scheduled for the selected date, with clickable cards that open intervention details in a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity authentication UI with loading states and automatic redirect to /clients after successful login.
frontend/src/pages/TechnicalFolderPage.t: Displays a hierarchical file browser for the technical folder with breadcrumb navigation, folder creation, file upload, and folder/file listing capabilities.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker for PWA functionality after page load with a 1-second delay to avoid blocking initial render.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, border radius variables, and typography/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state including existing features for file moving functionality and pending feature requests for backend move implementation and UI updates.
